00039   "  This command issues a ATTRGET request to Hyperspace.",

00044 void CommandAttrGet::run() {
00045   uint64_t handle;
00046   DynamicBuffer value(0);
00047 
00048   if (m_args.size() < 2 || m_args.size() > 3)
00049     HT_THROW(Error::PARSE_ERROR, "Wrong number of arguments.  Type 'help' for usage.");
00050 
00051   if (m_args[0].second != "" || m_args[1].second != "")
00052     HT_THROW(Error::PARSE_ERROR, "Invalid character '=' in argument.");
00053 
00054   handle = Util::get_handle(m_args[0].first);
00055 
00056   m_session->attr_get(handle, m_args[1].first, value);
00057 
00058   if (m_args.size() == 3) {
00059     if (m_args[2].first == "short") {
00060       if (value.fill() != 2)
00061         HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_ATTRIBUTE, "Expected 2 byte short, but got %lu bytes", (Lu)value.fill());
00062       short sval;
00063       memcpy(&sval, value.base, 2);
00064       cout << sval << endl;
00065     }
00066     else if (m_args[2].first == "int") {
00067       if (value.fill() != 4)
00068         HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_ATTRIBUTE, "Expected 4 byte int, but got %lu bytes", (Lu)value.fill());
00069       uint32_t ival;
00070       memcpy(&ival, value.base, 4);
00071       cout << ival << endl;
00072     }
00073     else if (m_args[2].first == "long") {
00074       if (value.fill() != 8)
00075         HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_ATTRIBUTE, "Expected 8 byte int, but got %lu bytes", (Lu)value.fill());
00076       uint64_t lval;
00077       memcpy(&lval, value.base, 8);
00078       cout << lval << endl;
00079     }
00080   }
00081   else {
00082     std::string valstr = std::string((const char *)value.base, value.fill());
00083     cout << valstr << endl;
00084   }
00085 
00086 }
